Package model

Class CompositeProduct

java.lang.Object
model.MenuItem
model.CompositeProduct
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CompositeProduct
extends MenuItem
Class represents an object that implements a real life menu type product which consists of multiple dishes with some specific attributes
See Also:
